summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing the terms under which they would sign an agreement and review associated numbers. The email emphasizes confidentiality and potential attorney-client privilege.

persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing terms related to a potential agreement.
